    • Method Detail

      • getChannelId

        java.util.UUID getChannelId()

        Get the channel ID

        Returns:
        UUID of the channel (primary key in DB)

      • getHistory

        ChannelHistory getHistory()

        Get message history of Channel

        Returns:
        The message history until now

      • getSubscribers

        java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentSkipListSet<User> getSubscribers()

        Get list of Users who subscribe to the Channel

        An implementation of this method should return a defensive copy because we want this data to be readonly. An alien class must not be able to add Users to the list of subscribers. It should always use the provided API to add subscribers to the Channel.

        Returns:
        subscribers of the Channel

      • appendMessage

        boolean appendMessage(Message incomingMessage)

        Add a message to the history of the channel

        Parameters:
        incomingMessage - the message sent to the channel
        Returns:
        true if adding is a success
